resources.string: Galaxy J5 Pro memiliki kamera Full HD beresolusi tinggi danfitur untuk menghemat pemakaian kuota data.

PLS LCD 5.2 inches, 74.5 cm2 (~70.7% screen-to-body ratio) 
 720 x 1280 pixels, 16:9 ratio (~282 ppi density)
 Corning Gorilla Glass (market dependent)
142.8 x 69.5 x 8.1 mm (5.62 x 2.74 x 0.32 in)\n 143 g (5.04 oz)\n Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)

Li-Ion 2400 mAh, non-removable
 Up to 16 h (3G)
 Up to 54 
 Black, Gold
